name: OpenOptionsPhotoshop
shortdesc: Options which are applied when opening or placing a Photoshop file.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: preserveLayers
property.shortdesc: Should layers be Preserve when the document is converted (default: true)

property.name: preserveImageMaps
property.shortdesc: Should image maps be preserved when the document is converted (default: true)

property.name: preserveSlices
property.shortdesc: Should slices be preserved when the document is converted (default: true)

property.name: preserveHiddenLayers
property.shortdesc: Should hidden layers be preserved when the document is converted (default: false)
